content: this darling headband is made of 6 squares that are seamed together a border outlines the piece and includes ties on each end the color combinations and tie lengths are easily customized making this simple project a great gift to shorten or lengthen ties create fewer or more chains when working the border change to next color at end of each round when changing colors work up to the last pull-through of the old color complete the stitch with the new color finished measurements length 16-1/2 not including ties width 3 needles & notions us size g-6 4mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle materials premier® yarns anti-pilling® everyday® dk 100% acrylic 7oz/200g 328yds/300m a 1107-02 cream 1 ball b 1107-52 seaglass 1 ball c 1107-61 peach blossom 1 ball d 1107-66 butter 1 ball skills/techniques used in this pattern chain slip_stitch single_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches magic_ring working in continuous and turned rounds changing colors
